Reviews.Title: I love it!!!!
Reviews.Content: I love my philips jr. because he's portable, cute, and easy in everyway. Each day at school I bring him along and take pictures of me and my friends. As soon as I get home, i download them onto the computer. It takes about 30 seconds, literally. And I'm not that fond of instructions or being patient. It works really well. In an instant my pics are up on the computer and I can print them and put them on my wall. Now, the quality of the pictures isn't WONDERFUL like a really exspensive camera. They're just really cute. They're not bad, I like them. A child's dream, at least for me. i don't think adults would be too pleased. Also, you gotta have could lighting. If you're taking a picture with little light, the picture will be black. But, over all I am so pleased with the product.

Reviews.Title: Lots of fun for kids!!
Reviews.Author: J. Jones "Pixie's mommy"
Reviews.Content: I bought these as stocking stuffers for my 8 and 10 year olds - they have had so much fun with them - they are small (think spy camera!!) and cute!The pics are decent! I was surprised - they are not going to be print quality, but fun for sharing on the computer.  They had fun with the video clip feature and the web cam feature!It can slip in a pocket, purse or clip to your keychain.  We have pink and blue versions!Fun for around $15!!

Reviews.Title: terrible camera is terrible
Reviews.Author: abe
Reviews.Content: -terrible picture quality-pictures come out terribly blurry and dark-eats up battery life-memory depends on battery life so if it runs out on you dont expect to find the pictures there-toooooo much software instalationoverall terrible camera

Reviews.Title: Good for children 5-6 yrs old.
Reviews.Author: S. Bhatt
Reviews.Content: It is good for 5-7 yrs old children. Do not expect "digital camera" like result. Children can take few shots. I do not know how to delete pictures to accomodate new one.

Reviews.Title: a BAD PRODUCT
Reviews.Author: RAM  IZA
Reviews.Content: I PURCHASED THE CAMERA AFTER ASKED YOUR CUSTOMER SERVICE IF THE CAMERA HAD ELECTRONIC FLASH OR NOT? AND YOUR DEPENDANT ANSWERED YES.SO HE LIED ME.I CAN BELIEVE AMAZON NEEDS TO LIE TO GET CLIENTS.YOU WON 30 DOLLARS AND LOST A CUSTOMER,BECAUSE I WILL NEVER BUY AGAIN WITH AMAZON

Reviews.Title: SLOW DELIVERY!
Reviews.Author: Joshua Bernstein
Reviews.Content: I paid extra money, $19.99 for faster delivery, turns out item was not in stock and it took about 2 weeks to receive- and was still charged the $19.99
